subject: Your account has been compromised
content:
Dear Valued Customer,

We have detected unusual activity on your account. Your account has been temporarily limited.

Please click the link below to verify your information and restore full access to your account:

https://paypa1-secure.com/verify

If you don't verify your account within 24 hours, it will be permanently suspended.

Thank you,
PayPal Security Team

subject: Your Amazon package delivery failed
content:
Dear Customer,

We attempted to deliver your package today but were unable to complete the delivery.

To reschedule your delivery, please confirm your details by clicking here:

Confirm Delivery Details

Your package will be returned to our warehouse if you don't respond within 3 days.

Amazon Delivery Services

subject: You have 3 new connection requests
content:
Hi there,

You have 3 new connection requests waiting for your response.

- Jane Smith, Senior Developer at Tech Solutions

- Michael Johnson, Project Manager at Enterprise Inc.

- Sarah Williams, HR Director at Global Innovations

Log in to your LinkedIn account to view and respond to these requests.

The LinkedIn Team

subject: Your Microsoft password will expire today
content:
URGENT: Your Microsoft password will expire in 12 hours

To ensure uninterrupted access to your Microsoft 365 services, please update your password immediately.

Click here to update: Reset Password Now

Ignore this message at your own risk. Account lockout will occur at midnight.

Microsoft 365 Support Team

subject: Your Weekly News Digest from The New York Times
content:

• Global Climate Summit Concludes with New Emission Targets
